function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear impact of policy variables on infection growth rates immediately after deployment","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of policy effectiveness and potential delay in identifying effective policies","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to understand the impact of policies on infection growth rates over time","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to track infection growth rates in relation to policy deployment","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Possible discrepancy between actual anti-contagion policies and their impact on infection or hospitalization growth rates","Impact":"Misinterpretation of policy effectiveness and failure to implement necessary measures","Mitigation":"Regular evaluation of policy effectiveness and adjustments based on infection growth rates","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to assess the impact of policies on infection growth rates","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited sample size and data for analysis","Impact":"Reduced reliability and generalizability of findings","Mitigation":"Seeking additional data sources and increasing sample size for more robust analysis","Technologies":"Data collection, collaboration with multiple sources for data aggregation","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
